properties.name: spring.data.remote.vertx.address-prefix
properties.description: Event bus address prefix for remote data operations.

properties.name: spring.data.remote.vertx.clustering-enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable clustering for distributed deployments.

properties.name: spring.data.remote.vertx.cluster-host
properties.description: Cluster host for joining the cluster. Only used when clustering is enabled.

properties.name: spring.data.remote.vertx.cluster-port
properties.description: Cluster port for joining the cluster. Only used when clustering is enabled.

properties.name: spring.data.remote.vertx.headers
properties.description: Custom headers/metadata to include with every request.

properties.name: spring.data.remote.vertx.event-loop-pool-size
properties.description: Number of event loop threads. Default: 2 * number of CPU cores.
